General.Name: Ways Electron Co Ltd
General.Description: Ways Electron Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of electronic components. It offers BL modules for auto application and consumer products, liquid crystal modules, touch screen products, hardware, rubber products, and IML products. The company formerly known as Kunshan Ways Electron Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Ways Electron Co.,Ltd. in June 2018. Ways Electron Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Kunshan, China.
